attributes.action: pressure google/youtube to police their own content
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Calling on the government to bring in legislation to make it an offence to upload violent 'happy slapping' videos to youtube and similar sites and to pressurize responsible parties to police their own content

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
